## Data Acquisition

All diabetes incidence rates are obtained from the CDC site. The map is obtained through open source in Kaggle.

## Animation

The animations are done in two steps. The first uses a function defined by users to define the next frame. These frames are the output needed for the FuncAnimation provided in the animation module in matplotlib to recursively extend the animation. Users can then play or stop the animation as needed.
